oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - John Ford Coley - 2004-06-26
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by John Ford Coley from the Ford Theatre at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on June 26, 2004
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: John Ford Coley;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress. Includes questions from the audience. Unidentified song possibly She's Got Another Thing Coming -- Unidentified song possibly One Of Those Nights -- I'd Really Love To See You Tonight -- We'll Never Have To Say Goodbye Again -- Who's Lonely Now -- Shoulda Never Left Texas -- Nights Are Forever -- Soldier In The Rain -- Love Is The Answer.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Coley, John Ford; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
